2 Text: Unspent Transaction Output. Bitcoin's accounting model.
Pay to Public Key Hash. Standard Bitcoin address type.
Pay to Script Hash. Enables complex scripts.
Segregated Witness. Separates signatures from transaction.
Fixes transaction malleability. Increases block capacity.
UTXO locked until block height or timestamp.
Hash Time-Locked Contract. Enables atomic swaps.
Signature can be modified without invalidating. Pre-SegWit issue.
